Text: I have had bits and pieces of this documentary on VHS since PBS broadcasted it during one of their fundraisers back in 1990 or so, and wore the video out watching it over and over. I have never seen all three episodes in its entirety, but it still made me a lifelong fan of old pale face.  I have searched for this release for many years with no luck. You, ThortonWilde, are my hero!  Great quality. Giving it a plus up, and of course I will help you seed. Thank you! : )
